scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model. The attacker uses a model inversion attack to infer protected attributes like income and age, violating customer privacy regulations.
initial_goal: Develop a model to predict customer churn based on publicly available data and internal model.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking - A large bank uses a machine learning model to predict which customers are likely to churn. The model is trained on sensitive customer data and deployed as a public API for internal use.
